red(String) - Static method in class Collecto.Colour
Turns the given string into a red string and resets the colour at the end of the string.
RED - Collecto.Ball
 
RED - Static variable in class Collecto.Colour
 
removeBalls(Move) - Method in class Collecto.GridBoard
Goes over the entire row or column in the direction of a given move, removes all balls that have neighbours of the same colour by calling the GridBoard.removeBalls(int, int) method and returning all removed balls in an ArrayList.
removeFromQueue(PlayerHandler) - Method in class Collecto.Server
Removes provided client from queue if it is already in it.
removePlayer(PlayerHandler) - Method in class Collecto.Server
